scripts.composer: docker-compose -f deployments/development/docker-compose.yml exec app-web env COMPOSER_MEMORY_LIMIT=-1 composer
scripts.db-update: yarn console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn console eccube:generate:proxies && yarn console doctrine:schema:update --force
scripts.reset: yarn console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn console eccube:install --no-interaction
scripts.stg:composer: docker-compose -f deployments/staging/docker-compose.yml exec app-web env COMPOSER_MEMORY_LIMIT=-1 composer
scripts.stg:console: docker-compose -f deployments/staging/docker-compose.yml exec app-web php bin/console
scripts.stg:db-update: yarn stg:console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn stg:console eccube:generate:proxies && yarn stg:console doctrine:schema:update --force
scripts.stg:reset: yarn stg:console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn stg:console eccube:install --no-interaction
scripts.prod:composer: docker-compose -f deployments/production/docker-compose.yml exec app-web env COMPOSER_MEMORY_LIMIT=-1 composer
scripts.prod:console: docker-compose -f deployments/production/docker-compose.yml exec app-web php bin/console
scripts.prod:db-update: yarn prod:console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn prod:console eccube:generate:proxies && yarn prod:console doctrine:schema:update --force
scripts.prod:reset: yarn prod:console cache:clear --no-warmup && yarn prod:console eccube:install --no-interaction
